bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability
Amendment 1: Information Model, YANG Data Model and Management Information Base Module

IEEE Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability - Amendment 1: Information Model, YANG Data Model and Management Information Base Module

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment specifies YANG data models and MIB modules that allow configuration and status reporting for bridges and end systems with the capabilities for Frame Replication and Elimination for Reliability (FRER) and stream identification.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs).
